Name: Whirlpool
Effect: Single Target. Low Accuracy 2. Blocks. Ongoing Damage. Duration 4 Rounds. Increase the Target's required Successes to Evade at Storyteller's discretion. If the Target is Out of Range due to using the Move 'Dive', this Move hits anyways.
Description: The foe is swallowed inside of a violent swirling whirlpool, trapping them in the violent currents, where they fight to stay afloat.
